item.description: Join Master Intuitive and Healer Anne Deidre for a journey to reconnect with your true self, gifts, talents and purpose. In this day long workshop Anne will work with you using her intuitive gifts to illuminate your inner brilliance, soul contracts and help you move through soul lessons with more ease and grace. She will intuitively connect with your heart chakra where your deepest soul contracts are held. In This Workshop You will: Discover your purpose at this point in time, Heal your wounds from the past, Receive tools and techniques to help you live your purpose and reignite your dreams. Please plan on brining a perpared lunch as there will not be enought time to go out. Please bring a journal or notebook and pen to write with. Cost is $80 per person. Early bird special fee of $70 if paid for by November 17th

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Your Intuitive Life Makeover Workshop w/ Anne Deidre
